title: STEAM Teacher Self-Efficacy Enhancement Program Utilizing Educational Robotics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education competencies and understanding of STEAM education concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on instructional design competency development through collaborative learning environments for corporate math education managers

learning_goals: Develop at least three educational robotics-based STEAM lesson plans through Collaborative Lesson Design (CLD)
Achieve over 80% improvement in the ability to design assessment items utilizing educational robotics tools
Apply at least five student engagement strategies for building self-directed learning environments
Meet formative assessment criteria for designing mathematical concept visualization through robotics activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
